banner.text:
Great work! Remember, if you click and drag on the background
you can move all the blocks at once.

OK! When the Hero collects the treasure, you want to make the treasure appear somewhere else.
Open the dot code tray to build the next stage of your game.
Do you remember how to set the x position?

Connect the block inside the collision test...
you coded it in the last challenge!
Now let's set the x position...
...to a random number.
Connect it to the x position.
Nice! Now, change it from 10 to 16.
Can you do the same for the treasure’s y value?
Can you do the same for the treasure’s y value?
Connect it beneath the x position.
Great! Now set y to a random number too.
Great! Now set y to a random number too.
Connect it to the code...
... and change it from 10 to 8.

Awesome! Let’s add some sound effects!
Click 'Add Part'.

tooltips.text: Click on Speaker to add it to your app

banner.text: The code for sounds lives in the Speaker tray.
Grab the 'Speaker: play' block.
Connect it here.
Now find the sounds block.
Fetch it...
...and connect the speaker and sound blocks together.
Change it from drum machine to sounds...
... and change this to Ping.

Try it out! Move your Hero on top of the golden treasure.
What happens?
Well done! This is going to be a great game!
